section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Transnational associations and networks of public regional or other sub-national authorities
goals__remit: The Nordic Council of Ministers is the official body for Nordic intergovernmental co-operation. The Nordic prime ministers have overall responsibility for Nordic co-operation. In practice, responsibility is delegated to the Ministers for Nordic Co-operation and to the Nordic Committee for Co-operation, which co-ordinates the day-to-day work of official political Nordic co-operation.
position: Chief of Staff/Office of the Secretary General
